City of La Joya
---------------

701 E Expy 83.   
La Joya, Texas 78560

**[956-581-7002](tel:956-581-7002)**

Monday 8AM - 5PM  
Tuesday 8AM - 5PM
  
Wednesday 8AM - 5PM
  
Thursday 8AM - 5PM
  
Friday 8AM - 5PM
  
Saturday - Closed
  
Sunday - Closed
